24.post_text: Here’s the livery Pure Perfomance, inspired by the iconic #F50 from 1995. #Ferrari70

comments.message: So the exterior of a 488 with the interior of an F12 Berlinetta?? That's a mad combo but still, people think its a nice car because it's a Ferrari when really Ferrari don't make nice looking cars anymore.
Aka black... seriously guys, 90% of your posts are not even real photos just some configurator outputs..
While I couldn't care less for all this liveries thing, thanks for the picture of the pre-production model (y)

Of course I would LOVE to have an 812 SuperFast and an FXX in my garage..!! 
But, in truth, I will enjoy a nice California Convertible much more, for actual personal use. It doesn't match the Extreme Performance of the other 2, but I am not looking for a car to Race around Road Atlanta [which is just a few miles from my home] but to "Play" in the mountains of the southern Appalachian Mountains...or cruising open country roads of the southeast USA with the top down and good music on the stereo!
{And with an artificial hip and knee, it will be a LOT easier to get in and out of!} <3
